_comment: Configure agent role assignments here. Add GitHub usernames (not @mentions) to assign specific users when role labels are applied to issues or PRs.

_usage_notes.description: Agent roles work via labels, not @mentions. Apply role labels to issues/PRs to trigger automated assignment.
_usage_notes.example_user: role:swe assigns to usernames listed in role_mappings['role:swe']
_usage_notes.example_team: Use 'team:engineering' format to assign to a GitHub team
_usage_notes.disable: Set auto_assign_on_label to false to disable automation
